manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SEAFEW Travel Hiking Daypack Multipurpose Sling Backpack

This Crossbody Daypack is very convenient! while you go to the travel, bag is smartly designed to hold quite a few essential travel tools without being too big to get in the way. The pocket in the front for your cell phone is so convenient. It was so handy when you wanted to take a picture, or needed to look up directions. You didn't have to turn the bag around and dig in for yourphone. Getting to your items was easy and the option to wear the bag in the front was reassuring in crowded, high risk for pick pocketing areas. This sling bag has Adjustable Reversible Shoulder Strap! The back strap is convertible left or right, You can easily change the strap to switch which shoulder it hangs from which is nice so left handers can use the bag as well. It felt comfortable across my shoulder and chest all day.

The Perfect size Backpack! This bag dimensions: 13.77 x 8.26 x 4.33 inches/35*21*11(l x w x h). It is small but it still holds a lot. Overall this is a nice little bag to carry necessities like sunscreen, snacks and a water bottle,mini ipad, phone, umbrella,wallet etc. Breathable Mesh back! Someone has concern is sweat. But this sling bag is made of mesh material . It is very soft and breathable, so when you sweat a lot and there is a mesh on the back which can dry quick You do not need to worrry about this

The belt uses the latest magnet buckle technology! Once secured, the buckle will remain fastened; no need to worry about the strength of the buckle. When you're ready for removal, simply pulling on the small attached cord will unfasten the buckle.

Suitable for women men, suitable for outdoor sports, office and business. This sling bag is suitable for women men, suitable for outdoor sports (hiking, cycling, biking, walking, running, camping, climbing), office and business.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect bag for travelling!
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I brought this bag to our LA trip and it was perfect! It is compact but spacious and we also really love the bottle pocket!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Although this is a men’s backpack, I wanted something sturdy. Good quality with lots of compartments, and this backpack was perfect straps were just a bit too long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice shoulder bag. Could’ve been a bit larger
reviews.reviewText: The quality and material is top notch. But the size could have been a bit larger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel bag.
reviews.reviewText: Just the right size for a daypack. Bought it fora 3-week tour and used it every day. Love the quick-release feature on the strap for when I had a larger pack over top and had to remove quickly. Great for airports. Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s nice but it gave me friction rash
reviews.reviewText: This item is very useful for a trip where you can organize a bunch of stuff and it fits so much. My only major issue was when I was alway I wore it for a long period of time and it kept giving me that rug burn feel. It also kept hitting my butt (I am 5 ft so it could just be me. But the more weight and longer time carrying it just gave me such a burning feeling on my neck constantly. I wouldn’t suggest it for trips where you need this on for a long time but it great with short daily life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very well made and durable
reviews.reviewText: It was perfect for what l needed. Big enough but not to big. It accommodated want I used for work

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Strap too long
reviews.reviewText: Confused why no one else is mentioning this. The strap is extremely long. I’m 5’6” and this bag goes down to my butt. It’s not usable. The tightest length needs to be at least 8 inches shorter

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Day Bag
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Bought this bag to hold a GoPro and water bottle. Fits great. Not too small or too large. Light weight. Only problem is that the strap is too large.

Me encantó, los materiales son de buena calidad tiene espacio suficiente para guardar mi uniforme de trabajo y un Tupper para mi almuerzo, además de todos los bolsos qué tiene donde guardo mis cosas esenciales, estoy feliz con mi compra
